#summary OWL2 interpretation as FOL.

= Introduction =

This page is dedicated to the interpretation of [http://www.w3.org/TR/owl2-syntax/ OWL2] as [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/First_order_logic first-order logic].


= Details =
